Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to a study of an autonomous rail rapid transit (ART) network in the city of New York
Summary: Directs the MTA to study the feasibility of developing and operating an autonomous rail rapid transit (ART) network in the city of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the metropolitan transportation authority to study the feasibility of developing and operating an autonomous rail rapid transit (ART) network in the city of New York
